mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apply_history ( project_name, environment_name, group_name, server_name, tag_name, tag_comment, apply_time ) VALUES ( #{projectName}, #{environmentName}, #{groupName}, #{serverName}, #{tagName}, #{tagComment}, #{applyTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT apply_histroy_id as applyHistroyId, project_name as projectName, environment_name as environmentName, group_name as groupName, server_name as serverName, tag_name as tagName, tag_comment as tagComment, apply_time as applyTime FROM apply_history WHERE project_name = #{projectName} ORDER BY apply_histroy_id DESC

SELECT apply_histroy_id as applyHistroyId, project_name as projectName, environment_name as environmentName, group_name as groupName, server_name as serverName, tag_name as tagName, tag_comment as tagComment, apply_time as applyTime FROM apply_history WHERE project_name = #{projectName} AND apply_histroy_id = #{applyHistroyId}
SELECT DISTINCT tag_name as tagName FROM apply_history WHERE project_name = #{projectName} ORDER BY apply_histroy_id DESC
